# boundingRegion

**Instance Property**

A polygon that defines the boundary of text.

## Declaration

```swift
var boundingRegion: NormalizedRegion { get }
```

## Parameters

- **boundingBox**: The bounding box of the object.

## Inspecting the text

- **textAlignment**: The alignment of the text within its container.
